fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: -Each night, you may convert somebody into a Mafia Locust

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-Mafia Locusts you create cannot use their ability, nor do they gain the following attribute
-If you die, a random mafia locust unlocks their ability to convert, and gains this attribute.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Convert everybody who shall oppose you!
